channel.title: Homesteading on Parker Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Homesteading on Parker Smith

item.title: Soapmaking
item.description: Part of being self-sufficient is knowing how to make your own stuff, and piggy backing off of bread, now I’ll introduce soap. Coincidentally, the recipe I am using is just 4 ingredients, but this time I won’t be eating them haha! Recipe: https://thethingswellmake.com/wprm_print/10856 Made a simple and sturdy wood soap mold with plastic dividers. Laughable at how the names turned out. So many lessons learned when de-molding.
